content: चक्रं [क्रियते अनेन, कृ घञर्थे क नि° द्वित्वम् <ls>Tv.</ls>] {@--1@} The wheel of a carriage; चक्रवत्परिवर्तंते दुःखानि च सुखानि च <ls>H. 1. 173.</ls> {@--2@} A potter's wheel. {@--3@} A sharp circular missile weapon, a disc (especially applied to the weapon of Viṣṇu). {@--4@} An oil mill. {@--5@} A circle, ring; कलापचक्रेषु निवेशिताननं <ls>Rs. 2. 14.</ls> {@--6@} A troop, multitude, collection, <ls>Śi. 20. 17.</ls> {@--7@} A realm, sovereignty. {@--8@} A province, district, a group of of villages. {@--9@} A form of military array in a circle. {@--10@} A circle or depression of the body. {@--11@} A cycle, cycle of years. {@--12@} The horizon. {@--13@} An army, a host. {@--14@} Section of a book. {@--15@} A whirlpool. {@--16@} The winding of a river. {@--17@} An astronomical circle; राशि° the zodiac. {@--18@} Circular flight (of birds &c.). {@--19@} A particular constellation in the form of a hexagon. {@--20@} Range, department in general. {@--21@} The convolutions or spiral marks of the शालिग्राम. {@--22@} A crooked or fraudulent contrivance. --क्रः {@--1@} The ruddy goose (also called चक्रवाक). {@--2@} A multitude, troop, group.
